name: Salon-eez
description:
this is a salon management site and my G.A week 4 project **** ## How to get started a salon manager will be able to sign in to their account to manage the employees,
stylist schedules ,
and the customers and equipment each stylists uses **** ## Wireframes ERD is [here](https://lucid.app/lucidchart/9b559ac0-d80c-491b-8c2d-556a424a257b/edit?beaconFlowId=00F239760635ACE5&page=0_0#)
file structure is [here](https://lucid.app/lucidchart/eb552c90-7ca6-466d-8650-8e05767bedea/edit) **** ## Credits Created by: Benjamin Roth
